org.opengis.cite.gpkg12.extensions.elevation

Class ElevationTests

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opengis.cite.gpkg12.CommonFixture
      • org.opengis.cite.gpkg12.tiles.TileTests
        • org.opengis.cite.gpkg12.extensions.elevation.ElevationTests

  • public class ElevationTests
extends TileTests
    Defines test methods that apply to descriptive information about a GeoPackage's content as it pertains to tiled, gridded elevation data.

    Sources

    • GeoPackage Encoding Standard - Annex F.11 Elevation (OGC 12-128r13)
    Author:
    Jeff Yutzler

      • imageFormat

        public void imageFormat()
                 throws SQLException,
                        IOException
        For data where the datatype column of the corresponding row in the gpkg_2d_gridded_coverage_ancillary table is integer, the tile_data BLOB in the tile pyramid user data table containing tiled, gridded elevation data SHALL be of MIME type image/png and the data SHALL be 16-bit unsigned integer (single channel - "greyscale"). For data where the datatype column of the corresponding row in the gpkg_2d_gridded_coverage_ancillary table is float, the tile_data BLOB in the tile pyramid user data table containing tiled, gridded elevation data SHALL be of MIME type image/tiff and the data SHALL be 32-bit floating point as described by the TIFF Encoding (Requirement 120).
        Overrides:
        imageFormat in class TileTests
        Throws:
        SQLException - If an SQL query causes an error
        IOException - If the bytes of an image cause an error when read
        See Also:
        MIME Type PNG or TIFF - Requirement 132/133
